mapper.select: select no, user_id, title, board.content, board.registDate, comment.content as "comment_content" from board left outer join comment on board.no = comment.board_no;

select no, user_id, title, board.content, board.registDate, board.updateDate, board_no, comment.content as "comment_content", comment.registDate as "comment_registDate" , comment.updateDate as "comment_updateDate" from board left outer join comment on board.no = comment.board_no where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, title, content, registDate, updateDate ) values (#{user_id},#{title},#{content},now(),now())
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateDate = now() where no = #{no}
update comment set content = #{content}, updateDate = now() where board_no = #{board_no}
